message: Take it or leave it, Bob. It's a good deal for you, considering you'll get nothing if we keep going.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a sizable sum to end this quickly. Every round that passes hurts you more than it hurts me.
Bob, this is my final offer. I'm willing to give you more than what you offered me, but I'm losing money with every round. It's in both our best interests to end this here.
